name: Daybreak - custom campaign
description:
Custom campaign series with custom units and buildings. As I'm still making a base mod now, there's really a little to explain about this. I add assets to mod whenever I need them in new mission.

Current status

- Daybreak mod: Unfinished 



1. 1 playable race and 3 non-playables (non-playable races will be poorly detailed) 
2. New heroes 



- Mission 01: Alpha 
- Mission 02: Unfinished 



I'm trying to make 12 maps for this campaign.
